text: Dimitris "Mimis" Domazos (22 January 1942 â€“ 24 January 2025) was a Greek professional footballer. He played as an attacking midfielder. He played for the Greek national football team from 1959 to 1980, making fifty appearances. On 22 January 2025, his 83rd birthday, Domazos was hospitalized in Athens, Greece, after going into cardiac arrest. He died two days later. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Greek footballers Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest
title: Mimis Domazos
